name: The Official Otakon Super Beat Em' Up Video Game!
blurb: Studio Nasu is teaming up with Otakon to bring you Crisis Heart Brawlers: Clash at Otakon, the official Otakon video game!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Every single dollar helps, and we appreciate this one! We'll credit every single backer at every level on our website. Thank you!

The OST on Disc:\r\nA hard copy of the Original Sound Track on CD featuring Eyeshine, Jake "Virt" Kaufman, Inverse Phase, DJ Cutman, and more!\r\nThis is a stand alone, cool extra and does not come with the game. You may add this amount to your pledge and select it in the survey at the end of Kickstarter. Great if you want another copy!

The Game: A digital copy of the game for PC or Mac \u2013MONTHS before the rest of the world! Actual game release to the public will be in August at Otakon 2013. Estimated release to backers: March of 2013

Backer Exclusive: The digital game above plus access to the locked developer forums and behind the scenes page, and beta testing. We\u2019ll be posting behind the scenes updates regularly and looking at your ideas for the game. Any ideas we use will get you into the game\u2019s ending credits as a contributing developer. We want to involve the community as much as possible, so we hope to see you there!

The Art of Crisis Heart Brawlers - Hard copy\r\nThis features concept art, full color illustrations, and lots of extra information about Crisis Heart Brawlers: Clash at Otakon.\r\nThis is a stand alone, cool extra and does not come with the game. You may add this amount to your pledge and select it in the survey at the end of Kickstarter. Great if you want another copy!
Special Edition: All previous rewards plus a digital PDF artbook and behind the scenes video. All backers at this level are credited in the backer\u2019s section of the game\u2019s ending credits.
Collector\u2019s Edition:  All previous rewards plus a digital soundtrack and 11x17 CHB limited edition print available to backers only.

Disc Version: A shiny, hard copy of the game (currently for PC and Mac) on disc, complete with box art and instructions, and a second disc with digital soundtrack, art gallery, and behind the scenes compilation video. All previous rewards included.

Collector\u2019s Edition Hard Copy: The game on disc, Soundtrack on CD with packaging and unique art, a physical art book, and a limited edition CHB Character button of your choice, plus the poster and all previous rewards.

Otakon is hosting an exclusive release party Thursday night right before the con! Come join the developers, voice actors, musicians, artists and other creators and contributors of CHB: CaO as we play the game, hang out, and party!\r\nPick up a special, limited edition Otakon style Backer Badge and party the night away with us! A great way to start your Otakon and support CHB at the same time! Thank you! We look forward to partying with you!
Ultimate Edition: The Collector\u2019s Edition with the full set of 5 limited edition prints and the CHB T-shirt. Thank you so much for supporting us at this level!

Supporter Edition: A special custom badge drawn for you (doesn\u2019t get you into the con, but you were going anyway, right?) and a special shout out in the credits of your choice. Tell that special someone how awesome they are, or just say \u201cHi mom!\u201d Comes with Ultimate edition.

Developer edition: Same as Ultimate edition, but with an archive of some early builds of the game! See and play first-hand how the game progressed whenever you want! You\u2019ll also get copies of our focus and design docs! Basically, blueprints of our game! Use them as a template, or just a reference for your own games! Granted, we\u2019ll be editing out small details (due to NDAs) but the designs and creative stuff will be fully intact, and signed! Plus: get an interview with the lead programmer and producer to ask any questions you may have! We\u2019ll even give your next game a shout out on twitter, facebook, and our webpage. =)
Art Collectors: A signed, original sketch that was used in the game! One of a kind, and yours forever. Comes with Ultimate Edition and all previous rewards.

Party Edition: Otakon is hosting an exclusive release party Thursday night right before the con! Come join the developers, voice actors and contributors of CHB: CaO as we play the game, hang out, and party! Comes with the Ultimate Edition and TWO limited Otakon style Backer Badges to get you and a guest into the party! You can be sure to get some great autographs here!

You \u2013in the game! Get yourself, your character, or even your artist ally table and logo in the game! You\u2019ll be animated as an attendee or artist, and receive a special thanks with your website URL in the ending credits.

Otaku edition: The ultimate edition signed by up to five of your favorite CHB creators. Have your game signed by a voice actor, developer musician or anyone else who worked on the game. Please bear in mind that while we\u2019ll do our best to get your favorite creative to sign, we\u2019re all over the world, and depending on who you want, this may take time!

MORE of You \u2013in the game! Get yourself, your character, or even your artist ally table and logo in the game! You\u2019ll be animated as an attendee or artist, and receive a special thanks with your website URL in the ending credits. Comes with Collector's Edition!

Voice Actor Enthusiast! Party edition, but with the added bonus of a personalized voicemail (mp3 or other audio format) for your phone done by one of our VAs! Imagine your phone telling people to call you back after you\u2019re done powering up in the voice of the Dragon Ball Z narrator! Our producer will also spend some one-on-one time with you to talk about how he casts and works with voice actors, and send you home with some sample demo-reels to get you started. Got a demo reel of your own? Bring it along for a critique!

Virtual Studio: Join us live on Skype for a session as we record our voice actors in the studio at New Generation Pictures, the same studio responsible for the voice recorded in Capcom fighters like Street Fighter X Tekken, SFIV and MvC III. Comes with Ultimate Edition.

You \u2013As an Assist Striker! Want to be more prominently featured than an attendee? Now you or an original character you've created will be included in the game as a Striker! You\u2019ll be animated with a special assist move to come to the heroes' rescue when they're in need, and receive a special thanks with your website URL in the ending credits. Like the other a la carte rewards, this does not include the game.

Super Backer! Get the a limited Super Backer Badge and weekend membership to Otakon paid for by Studio Nasu. The Super Backer badge will get you into the Otakon CHB Release party, and into the Dealer Room or Video Game Room up to an hour early! Comes with Party Edition.\r\nThank you for being a super backer! We have a special section of the credits for you!

The golden ticket! This rare item will get you to the front of lines, front row seats, or early access to up to 5 of your favorite events at Otakon! We\u2019ll also pay for your weekend membership! Comes with Party Edition and a spot in the credits as a Super Backer!

Filled Sketchbook: We will fill an entire, really nice leather bound sketch book with game art for you. This will be the ONLY copy in existence, all original. WE won\u2019t even have a copy of this. ZOMG. I can\u2019t begin to stress how awesome this baby will be. We\u2019ll even give it to you with our thanks at Opening Ceremonies at Otakon 2013 if you like. Comes with the Party edition!

You: As an enemy! We\u2019ll put you, or the person/original character of your choice in the game as an enemy! You\u2019ll be all over the game! You\u2019ll get a special thanks in the game credits with your website URL if you have one. Comes with the party edition!

Ultimate Supporter Package: Thank you so much! You not only get to be an enemy in the game, but we\u2019ll cover your weekend badge with Golden Ticket, get you some signed original artwork from the game, into a Skype session as we record the voice actors, as well as your choice of a Voice Lesson from Kyle Hebert paid for by us, or a copy of the game\u2019s design docs! In addition, you get the Ultimate Edition of the game, and a special one of a kind Ultimate Backer Badge that will get you into the Otakon Release party as well as early access to the Dealer and Video Game Rooms! To top it all off, you\u2019ll get your own special thanks in the ending credits, and a thank you video shout out from the team on our website, Twitter and Facebook. To top it off, we\u2019ll thank you personally at Otakon\u2019s Opening Ceremonies and let you say hi to the masses if you want. Thank you so much for supporting us!

Join us in the studio in person! One backer will join us in the studio at New Generation Pictures as we record the voice actors! Travel and hotel room will be paid, and we\u2019ll even go out to dinner after. Come watch the magic happen! You can bet you\u2019ll get some sweet autographs, and even a chance to show off your own demo reel if you want! This unique reward comes with the Party Edition, and means you\u2019ll be in the behind the scenes video archive!
